gameModeOff.name: Apple Macbook air M2
gameModeOff.description: My MacBook is the perfect laptop for coding and everyday tasks. It’s lightweight, fast, and has incredible battery life, letting me work anywhere without worrying about charging.

gameModeOff.name: Iiyama G-Master GB3467WQSU-B5 Red Eagle
gameModeOff.description: This is a great ultrawide monitor for programming and multitasking. Its 34-inch display provides ample screen space for coding, debugging, and running multiple windows side by side.

gameModeOff.name: Custom electric Desk
gameModeOff.description: My electric desk has completely changed the way I work. With adjustable height, I can easily switch between sitting and standing, keeping me comfortable and focused throughout the day.

gameModeOff.name: Edifier R1600TIII
gameModeOff.description: They deliver clear and balanced sound, making coding sessions more enjoyable and music sound great.

gameModeOn.name: Rtx 4070TI Ryzen 9 9700X PC
gameModeOn.description: This rig is my powerhouse for high-FPS gaming. Whether it’s fast-paced shooters or graphically demanding RPGs, everything runs buttery smooth and looks stunning.

gameModeOn.name: Playstation
gameModeOn.description: The Apple Macbook air M2 is a great laptop for coding and web development. It is lightweight and has a great battery life. It is also very fast and has a great display.

gameModeOn.name: Sharp 42” Led
gameModeOn.description: Not the biggest screen out there, but perfect for my setup. It’s where I lose myself in epic worlds, from open-world RPGs to intense action games.

gameModeOn.name: Samsung Soundbar
gameModeOn.description: Nothing beats the feeling of deep bass during an intense boss fight. My soundbar makes every explosion, soundtrack, and battle hit harder.
